question: Who painted the portrait that is permanently displayed at the Louvre Museum in Paris?
What is the name of the mountain that sits on the border between the country where Edmund Hillary was from and China?
The scientist who formulated the laws of motion also contributed to which branch of mathematics that he shares credit for with Leibniz?
The person who proved lightning's electrical nature also conducted experiments in which city that later hosted the first electric power station?
In what country is the river located that is the source of most of the Nile's water?
The composer who wrote the 'Ode to Joy' was born in the same country as the inventor of the printing press. What country is that?
The structure of DNA was described in the same year as the first ascent of Mount Everest. What year was that?
What is the atomic number of the element that makes up about 46% of Earth's crust?
The Mona Lisa is thought to be a portrait of Lisa Gherardini. In which city was the artist who painted it born?
What type of animal is considered the only surviving lineage of the group that included Tyrannosaurus rex?
The inventor of the modern AC electricity system was born in the same empire as which famous composer born in Salzburg?
Alexander the Great died in the same region where which ancient civilization was founded on the banks of the Tiber River?
Insulin was discovered at the University of Toronto. What disease did it treat that previously meant death within months?
The man who led India's independence movement was assassinated in which year — the same decade that the Berlin Wall's construction would later divide?
What theory published by Einstein in 1915 redefined gravity as spacetime curvature rather than a force?
The person who received the Nobel Prize for discovering the ABO blood group system — in what year did they receive it?
What is the name of the rover that landed on the planet with the Solar System's highest mountain?
The largest contiguous land empire in history was founded by someone born around 1162. Who was he?
Cleopatra's death led to her country becoming a province of the empire whose fall is dated to what year?
The Taj Mahal was designated a UNESCO World Heritage Site. In which city on the river Yamuna is it located?
What celestial body's gravity is responsible for ocean tides, according to the article about the force that Newton described?
The Renaissance started in which Italian city, known for contributions by the artist who painted The Last Supper?
What was the name of the space mission that first landed humans on the Moon in 1969?
The Pacific Ocean was named by which explorer who called it 'peaceful'?
What event in Greek mythology was fought due to the abduction of Helen of Sparta?
The antibiotic era began with a discovery by a Scottish physician. What was the contaminating mould in his Petri dish?
Darwin's book 'On the Origin of Species' was published in the same century that the Sahara region's climate underwent enormous variations. What year was the book published?
The emperor who first joined the selective stretches of the Great Wall was also the first emperor of which country?
How many countries does the mountain range span that contains the peak first ascended by Edmund Hillary and Tenzing Norgay?
The element with atomic number 79 dissolves in what type of acid?
Who was the companion of Alexander the Great that also founded the dynasty Cleopatra VII belonged to?
The Berlin Wall fell in November 1989. How many years after its construction did it last?
What vitamin, discovered through clinical trials by James Lind, is also known as ascorbic acid?
The planet that Ferdinand Magellan named 'peaceful' covers approximately what percentage of Earth's total surface area?
What mathematical concept, introduced by Leonardo of Pisa, has its successive ratios converging to approximately 1.618?
Tesla moved to the United States in 1884 and initially worked for which famous inventor?
The pyramids that are the only surviving Wonder of the Ancient World were built for pharaohs of which dynasty?
The human heart pumps deoxygenated blood to the lungs through what type of arteries?
What writing system did Gutenberg's invention make dramatically cheaper to produce?
The Hubble Space Telescope was launched into orbit in what year, the same decade the Berlin Wall fell?
